Uses of Package
opennlp.tools.coref.resolver

Packages that use opennlp.tools.coref.resolver
opennlp.tools.coref Package related to performing coreference resolution. 
opennlp.tools.coref.resolver Package related to resolution techniques for coreference resolution. 
 

Classes in opennlp.tools.coref.resolver used by opennlp.tools.coref
AbstractResolver
          Default implementation of some methods in the Resolver interface.
 

Classes in opennlp.tools.coref.resolver used by opennlp.tools.coref.resolver
AbstractResolver
          Default implementation of some methods in the Resolver interface.
DefaultNonReferentialResolver
          Default implementation of the NonReferentialResolver interface.
MaxentResolver
          Provides common functionality used by classes which implement the Resolver class and use maximum entropy models to make resolution decisions.
NonReferentialResolver
          Provides the interface for a object to provide a resolver with a non-referential probability.
Resolver
          Interface for coreference resolvers.
ResolverMode
          Enumerated type specifying the modes if a resolver.
SingletonNonReferentialResolver
          This class allows you to share a single instance of a non-referential resolver among several resolvers.
